channel.title: Comments on: Becoming who I am

item.title: By: Jim Barrett
item.dc:creator: Jim Barrett
item.description: I am very jealous of your trip.
item.content:encoded: I am very jealous of your trip.

item.title: By: Lissa Barrett
item.dc:creator: Lissa Barrett
item.description: Awesome John. So glad that Facebook notified me of this! Have a wonderful time.
item.content:encoded: Awesome John. So glad that Facebook notified me of this! Have a wonderful time.

item.title: By: Vishnu Reddy
item.dc:creator: Vishnu Reddy
item.description:
Hey John,
All the best for your trip. Please ensure both of you keep atleast 2-3 days for Switzerland (not a night stay as you seem to have planned for now).
As I am going to be re-sharing each update from you, few blog/social media requests to make this easier :)
1. Create a travel FB page that is 1.1 Sync'ed with your blog to ensure we receive updates in the FB newsfeed 1.2 Allows my friends and other interested folks to follow you (Blog by itself is difficult to follow and obviously they can't follow your fb profile as such)
2. Travel Schedule: There are quite a few of us who may like to meet/host you along the way and so any tentative travel schedule would be great
item.content:encoded:
Hey John,

All the best for your trip. Please ensure both of you keep atleast 2-3 days for Switzerland (not a night stay as you seem to have planned for now).

As I am going to be re-sharing each update from you, few blog/social media requests to make this easier ðŸ™‚

1. Create a travel FB page that is
1.1 Sync’ed with your blog to ensure we receive updates in the FB newsfeed
1.2 Allows my friends and other interested folks to follow you (Blog by itself is difficult to follow and obviously they can’t follow your fb profile as such)

2. Travel Schedule: There are quite a few of us who may like to meet/host you along the way and so any tentative travel schedule would be great

item.title: By: molly
item.dc:creator: molly
item.description: Good luck John! I am very excited for you and hope that your trip is amazing!! Thanks for letting us all enjoy your adventures too!
item.content:encoded: Good luck John! I am very excited for you and hope that your trip is amazing!! Thanks for letting us all enjoy your adventures too!

item.title: By: Sam Labrador
item.dc:creator: Sam Labrador
item.description: Good luck John! I look forward to reading about all of your adventures!
item.content:encoded: Good luck John! I look forward to reading about all of your adventures!

item.title: By: Bonnie Hiatt
item.dc:creator: Bonnie Hiatt
item.description: Stay safe and have a blast.

item.title: By: Kit Ewing
item.dc:creator: Kit Ewing
item.description: I think this is wonderful. Enjoy life, be happy and take care of yourself. Can't wait to follow your journey.
item.content:encoded: I think this is wonderful. Enjoy life, be happy and take care of yourself. Can’t wait to follow your journey.

item.title: By: Jennifer Anderson
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Anderson
item.description: Whatever you become, whatever you do and wherever you go, I'm behind you 100% always you're biggest fan! I love you! LOVE your blog! Great way to document this time in your life!
item.content:encoded: Whatever you become, whatever you do and wherever you go, I’m behind you 100% always you’re biggest fan! I love you! LOVE your blog! Great way to document this time in your life!
